docblock.description: Class Definition for \Altamira\JsWriter\JsWriterAbstract
This class is responsible for aggregating charting options and rendering them in JavaScript.
docblock.long-description: There is a one-to-one relationship between JsWriters and charts. JsWriters are associated with different charting libraries.

docblock.description: The chart instance this JsWriter interacts with.
docblock.long-description: Each JsWriter is responsible for a single chart.

docblock.description: Global and chart-specific options.
docblock.long-description: Stored here to make it easier to json-encode.

docblock.description: Stores files that are required to properly render the registered chart
Stores JavaScript callbacks required to render the registered chart
Registry for types that may require different rendering.
docblock.long-description: A type registered as 'default' will work for all series that don't have a series registered.

docblock.description: String name of JsWriter library.
docblock.long-description: Required when writing a new class.

docblock.description: The namespace where type classes are stored for the concrete class
A flag for whether to use labels in this JsWriter.
docblock.long-description: Doesn't matter much unless you implement Labelable

docblock.description: Constructor method.
docblock.long-description: Requires the chart to be rendered. Every chart has its own JsWriter instance.

docblock.description: JSON-encoding with some additional treatments -- anything wrapped in hashes will be treated as bare in js (not wrapped in quotes, for example) -- callbacks are introduced where they are stored after json-encoding, so that they are evaluated
Registers a callback with the JsWriter and returns a key referencing it.
docblock.long-description: Used for find/replace during JSification

docblock.description: Returns an array of files required to render the chart Includes the default files, as well as any files registered by type It's important to note that some methods in concrete classes will add additional files to this instance
Returns the options for a series
supports accessing series values by instance or title
Returns an option for a specific series.
docblock.long-description: Accepts title or instance.

docblock.description: Set a series-specific value for rendering JS
Sets a global option for JS rendering
Returns global options stored in the JsWriter instance.
docblock.long-description: Allows for variable default value.

docblock.description: Initializes the storage location using the series title as a key
This is used to differentiate jsWriters of different kinds using a string name
Returns an type that has not yet been registered.
Returns the type instance for the provided key
Allows you to set discretely infinite nesting without notices by creating an empty array for key values that don't already exist

tag.description: the option array to operate against

tag.name: param
tag.description: the first any number of arguments to nest through an array, the final of which being the value to set

docblock.description: Allows you to get the value for discretely infinite nesting without notices by returning null without a warning if it doesn't exist

tag.name: param
tag.description: the first of any number of arguments to nest through an array, the final of which being the value to return
